get.description: Simple API to execute full-text searches within user's indexes. A more complexe API will be available with a POST verb.

parameters.description: The Importance Level range requested in form of `-10;10`

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: the search string

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: name of a field on which to perform the search. If omitted defaults to  _all .

parameters.name: doctype
parameters.description: type of documents to narrow the search to.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of documents to return per page, but only if param type is present.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip from the response, but only if param type is present.

200.description: an object holding an array of documents found. Docs are assembled by type.

messages.description: at most 5 documents are returned if query param  type  is not specified.

id.description: id of document (shortcut to fetch full doc from db if needed).

score.description: how confident is our index for this document to match the request. Higher is better. Documents are sorted on this field by default.

highlights.description: Field names where terms of request where found. Each key maps to an array of excerpts.

contacts.description: at most 5 documents are returned if query param  type  is not specified.

id.description: id of document (shortcut to fetch full doc from db if needed).

score.description: how confident is our index for this document to match the request. Higher is better. Documents are sorted on this field by default.
